Uses of Package
org.kiji.schema.layout

Packages that use org.kiji.schema.layout
org.kiji.schema The main package for users of KijiSchema. 
org.kiji.schema.filter Row level filters used when reading data from Kiji tables. 
org.kiji.schema.impl Implementations for the main KijiSchema classes and interfaces. 
org.kiji.schema.impl.hbase Implementations for the main KijiSchema classes and interfaces. 
org.kiji.schema.layout Kiji table layouts. 
org.kiji.schema.layout.impl Implementation for Kiji table layout management. 
org.kiji.schema.tools Package containing implementations, abstract base classes, and exceptions for kiji command-line tools. 
org.kiji.schema.util Package containing utility classes used throughout Kiji. 
 

Classes in org.kiji.schema.layout used by org.kiji.schema
CellSpec
          Specification of a column in a Kiji table.
ColumnReaderSpec
          Specification of read properties applied when decoding cells from a column in a Kiji table.
KijiTableLayout
          Layout of a Kiji table.
KijiTableLayoutDatabase
           A database of Kiji table layouts.

Classes in org.kiji.schema.layout used by org.kiji.schema.layout

          Interface for functions that resolve AvroSchema descriptors into Schema objects.
CellSpec
          Specification of a column in a Kiji table.
ColumnReaderSpec
          Specification of read properties applied when decoding cells from a column in a Kiji table.
ColumnReaderSpec.AvroDecoderType
          For Avro encoded columns, specifies the type of decoder to use: generic or specific.
ColumnReaderSpec.AvroReaderSchemaType
          For Avro encoded columns, specify which reader schema to apply when decoding cells.
ColumnReaderSpec.Encoding
          Master encoding of the column's content.
InvalidLayoutException
          Thrown when an invalid Kiji layout is encountered.
KijiColumnNameTranslator
          Translates between HTable and Kiji table column names.

          Concrete layout of a locality group.

          Concrete layout of a family.
KijiTableLayout.LocalityGroupLayout.FamilyLayout.ColumnLayout
          Concrete layout of a column.
TableLayoutBuilder
          An experimental table layout builder class.
TableLayoutBuilder.LayoutOptions
          Options to normalize table layout descriptors.
TableLayoutBuilder.LayoutOptions.SchemaFormat
          Ways to represent an Avro schema.
